text: Roman Perko (born 12 May 1977) is a Slovenian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1998 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Slovenia Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:People from Tržič
title: Roman Perko
